articles.description: Brevin Pritzl drains the deep three and then makes a steal to get a transition layup as Wisconsin leads Purdue 14-12.
articles.headline: Pritzl's offensive explosion gives Badgers lead

images.caption: Brevin Pritzl drains the deep three and then makes a steal to get a transition layup as Wisconsin leads Purdue 14-12.
images.name: Brevin Pritzl drains the deep three and then makes a steal to get a transition layup as Wisconsin leads Purdue 14-12.

articles.description: Trae Young's spirits were buoyed by a surprise phone call Wednesday from Hall of Famer Oscar Robertson, who gave the Sooners freshman "some good advice."
articles.headline: Trae Young gets 'good advice' from Hall of Famer Oscar Robertson

images.caption: Trae Young is ice cold from the field, shooting 4-of-16 and scoring 19 points, as the No. 7 Red Raiders defeat the No. 23 Sooners 88-78.
images.name: Oklahoma falls to Texas Tech, suffers fourth consecutive loss

articles.description: Commodores senior Riley LaChance joins The Paul Finebaum Show to recap his game-winning shot vs. MSU and share his outlook on the rest of the season.
articles.headline: LaChance hopes Vandy can make late-season run

images.caption: Commodores senior Riley LaChance joins The Paul Finebaum Show to recap his game-winning shot vs. MSU and share his outlook on the rest of the season.
images.name: LaChance hopes Vandy can make late-season run

articles.description: Clemson junior guard Shelton Mitchell is out of the hospital but remains in the concussion protocol following an injury suffered during Wednesday's loss to Florida State.
articles.headline: Clemson's Shelton Mitchell exits hospital after hit to head

articles.description: Mark Schlabach joins OTL to discuss a U.S. District Court denying a motion to dismiss federal criminal charges against three of the 10 men arrested for their alleged roles in the FBI's two-year investigation into college basketball corruption.
articles.headline: Court denies dismissal off CBB probe

articles.description: Reggie Lynch maintains his innocence against sexual misconduct allegations but has dropped appeals of his Minnesota expulsion because he does not feel he could receive a fair hearing.
articles.headline: Reggie Lynch drops appeals of sexual misconduct rulings, accepts expulsion
